DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year old , < 80 year old clinical indication diagnostic coronary angiography evaluate possible coronary artery disease Pregnancy Known allergy iodinate contrast Patients receive iodinated contrast material within last week unable give consent Renal insufficiency ( > 1.5mg/dL ) Acute myocardial infarction within one week Cardiogenic shock heart function worse New York Heart Association functional class III Left main coronary artery disease Prior coronary artery bypass graft treatment Prior percutaneous coronary intervention treatment
